name: MD+ for Google Allo
description: A quick hack job to make Allo look a bit more like Hangouts. If you want to use a custom color, press "Show Advance Settings" below and pick whatever color you want!
additional_info:
8/21/2017:
- Minor optimization
- Fixed shadow that appears when scrolling down conversation list

8/20/2017:
- Added the option to pick from a set of custom backgrounds for conversations
- Improved shadow
- Fix new conversation textbox having accent color 
- Thanks to Carlos Jeurissen for the help! Without him most of this stuff wouldn't be possible

8/19/2017:
- Fixed hamburger menu disappearing when window is set to a certain size
- Minor bug fixes
- Hamburger and dot menu are now vector images, better support for high DPI

8/18/2017:
- Fixed a few elements being the wrong color
- Warning message will now appear if the user tries to apply a normal Allo theme

8/17/2017:
-Added custom colors
-Added hamburger menu and more menu
-fixed issues with contacts with no assigned photo
